task.title: Creating a New Save in Stardew Valley
task.shortdesc: To replay, or begin playing, Stardew Valley, you need to start a new save.

taskbody.prereq:
To create a new save in Stardew Valley you must first:
Have Steam installed and be signed in
Have Stardew Valley in your library (meaning you were gifted the game, or have purchased it)
Have Version 1.6 of Stardew Valley installed
taskbody.context: To create a new save you will:

step.cmd: Once you have made your selections you will be able to click the OK button to continune with the game!
